Pre-Game Insights: Jesse Marsch has said to expect changes in the lineup, with players like Ali Ahmed, Mathieu Choinière, and Tani Oluwaseyi potentially getting a longer look.
One particularly interesting name that Marsch mentioned who could be in line for his first international start on Saturday is 18-year-old defender Luc de Fougerolles of Fulham.
Canada has an ability to bounce back after disappointment, as shown in their performances after losses to the Netherlands and Argentina.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada has reignited belief in the program at this 2024 Copa América.
The 2026 FIFA World Cup on home soil is now just under 700 days away.
Uruguay is the only team to have defeated Argentina since the 2022 World Cup, doing so at La Bombonera in Buenos Aires.
Others: The match is scheduled for July 13, 2024, at 8 p.m. ET/5 p.m. PT at Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte, North Carolina.
Guillermo Varela, a defender for Uruguay, is suspended due to a late red card in the semi-final loss to Colombia.
Rodrigo Bentancur, a midfielder for Uruguay, is unlikely to be available against Canada due to injury.
